name: WebGL2RenderingContext.blitFramebuffer
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.blitFramebuffer() method of the WebGL 2 API transfers a block of pixels from the read framebuffer to the draw framebuffer.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'blitFramebuffer' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 3.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glBlitFramebuffer' in the 'OpenGL ES 3.0' specification.
